name: Brichi Quest
description:
Brichi Quest - simple and uncomplicated adventure roguelike without a plot and deep lore. Explore procedurally generated islands and dungeons.
Look for blueprints on islands or in dungeons. Pick them up to unlock the ability to build bridges to the next islands.
Fight monsters. Each creature has a unique behavior. Look for consumables - potions and bombs. Defeat the boss and select a special item in the treasure room.
Melee weapons found in dungeons have hidden passive abilities. Perform a 10 hit combo with the weapon you wish to awaken. Weapons have up to three awakening levels. But be careful, because if you awaken another weapon, the abilities of the previous weapon will be canceled. There are also throwing weapons and magical staves for ranged combat. Build your hero class with a combination of different weapons and upgrades for health, stamina, additional damage. Complete the 3 required dungeons to unlock the last one with the final boss.
Be careful and don't jump into the water. If you fall, you will drown. The save will also be deleted.
